name: perl-dbd-mysql
description: MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface (DBI)

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-dbi
dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.

dependencies.name: mariadb
dependencies.description:
MariaDB Server is one of the most popular database servers in the world.
MariaDB turns data into structured information in a wide array of
applications, ranging from banking to websites. It is an enhanced, drop-
in replacement for MySQL. MariaDB is used because it is fast, scalable
and robust, with a rich ecosystem of storage engines, plugins and many
other tools make it very versatile for a wide variety of use cases.

dependent_to.name: biopieces
dependent_to.description:
The Biopieces are a collection of bioinformatics tools that can be
pieced together in a very easy and flexible manner to perform both
simple and complex tasks.
